snippet: John Eliot Gardiner, a founder of the period-instrument movement who turns 70 this month, has a soft spot for Bach — as evidenced by his nine-hour marathon last week.
abstract: John Eliot Gardiner, founder of the period-instrument movement, has dedicated much of his musical career to appreciation of Bach; Gardiner celebrated his 70th birthday with marathon nine-hour Bach concert at the Royal Albert Hall in London.
lead_paragraph: John Eliot Gardiner, a founder of the period-instrument movement who turns 70 this month, has a soft spot for Bach — as evidenced by his nine-hour marathon last week.

headline.seo: John Eliot Gardiner and Period Music
headline.main: Crops and Music, Each in Its Season
headline.print_headline: Crops and Music, Each in Its Season
